nodes.text: "An Extinct Guest" is a short story written by Trevor J. Wilson and Craig Robert Carey. It forms part of the article "Alien Encounters" in Star Wars Adventure Journal 14, first published in August 1997. The story tells of the Iyra sentientologist Tem Eliss receiving a visit from S'itl Thirr, a member of the Abinyshi, a species that Galactic Empire records listed as extinct.
